00033 class MDeviceState: public QObject
00034 {
00035     Q_OBJECT
00036 
00037 public:
00038

00041 
00042     virtual bool displayOff() const { return display_off; }
00043     bool ongoingCall() const { return ongoing_call; }
00044     bool incomingCall() const { return incoming_call; }
00045     virtual const QString &screenTopEdge() const { return screen_topedge; }
00046     virtual bool isFlat() const { return is_flat; }
00047     virtual const QString &touchScreenLock() const
00048     { return touchScreenLockMode; }
00049

00051 
00052     void incomingCall();

00056     void isFlatChange(bool is_flat);
00057

00065 #endif
